div.div: Rush County Schools - Educating students today for their success tomorrow.

div.span: Online Kindergarten Round Up for Rush County Schools is now open. If you have a student who will be 5 years of age by August 1, 2020, make plans now to attend RCS Online Kindergarten Round Up. Instructions for completing the Online Round Up are at http://docs.rushville.k12.in.us/OnlineKG.

Rush County Schools’ Mission is . . .
Educating students today for their success tomorrow.

div.div:
Dear Rush County Schools Families,
Indiana public schools and closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year. Here are a few items of importance in relation to this situation:
· All state spring assessments have been cancelled.
· Starting March 30th, Mondays and Fridays will be waived days (no school). Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays will be eLearning Days.
· We are concerned that some do not have internet access. Our school Wi-Fi has been expanded into most of our parking lots in an attempt to help. If you are in need of assistance please contact your child’s principal.
· We may be looking to adjust our meal distribution program. If you are unable to make it to the pickup sites, please contact your child’s principal.
· There will no events, activities, practices, etc…during this closure. All athletic facilities are closed.
· Mental Health services are still available by contacting Centerstone, Meridian, or our at-risk counselors.
· I will continue to communicate with you in the coming days.
I understand that eLearning is not a perfect situation. However, the goal is to keep students updated and as involved as possible. We will continue to look for ways to make this better.
This is an extremely fluid situation, and we will continue to make decisions and changes as we work through this. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
I encourage you to take care of yourself and your family. Obviously this is a very serious situation and one that cannot be taken lightly.
Thank you.
Get exclusive, instant school closings and delays sent to your cell phone or e-mail. Click here to sign up for WISH TV Text Alerts.
